channel.title: Gilles Lellouche on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Gilles Lellouche on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Dog 51’ Review: Adèle Exarchopoulos in a Slick French Dystopian Thriller That’s Easy to Watch, and Even Easier to Forget
item.description: Gilles Lellouche co-stars in Cédric Jimenez’s Venice Film Festival closer, set in a Paris of the near future.

item.title: ‘Dog 51’ Review: Adèle Exarchopoulos in a Slick French Dystopian Thriller That’s Easy to Watch, and Even Easier to Forget
item.description: Gilles Lellouche co-stars in Cédric Jimenez’s Venice Film Festival closer, set in a Paris of the near future.

item.title: Cédric Jimenez on ‘Dog 51,’ French Sci-Fi, and Pitting Real Actors Against AI
item.description: The ‘November’ and ‘Stronghold’ director talks pushing genre boundaries with his Venice closer ‘Dog 51,’ the challenges of crafting an AI villain, and the enduring influence of 1970s Hollywood.

item.title: Cédric Jimenez on ‘Dog 51,’ French Sci-Fi, and Pitting Real Actors Against AI
item.description: The ‘November’ and ‘Stronghold’ director talks pushing genre boundaries with his Venice closer ‘Dog 51,’ the challenges of crafting an AI villain, and the enduring influence of 1970s Hollywood.
